verses.text: \w Deliver|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w from|strong="H7971"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* enemies, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w*; \w protect|strong="H8104"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w from|strong="H7971"\w* those \w who|strong="H8104"\w* rise \w against|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w Deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w from|strong="H6965"\w* workers \w of|strong="H6965"\w* iniquity, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w save|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w from|strong="H6965"\w* men \w of|strong="H6965"\w* bloodshed.

See how they lie \w in|strong="H1818"\w* wait for \w me|strong="H3467"\w*. Fierce men conspire against \w me|strong="H3467"\w* for \w no|strong="H6466"\w* transgression \w or|strong="H1818"\w* sin \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* own, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* fault \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* move swiftly \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w attack|strong="H1481"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*. Arise \w to|strong="H3068"\w* help \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H5315"\w* notice.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H5771"\w* Hosts, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* God \w of|strong="H5771"\w* Israel, \w rouse|strong="H5782"\w* \w Yourself|strong="H5782"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* punish \w all|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* nations; \w show|strong="H7200"\w* \w no|strong="H1097"\w* mercy \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* wicked traitors. Selah

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* return \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* evening, snarling \w like|strong="H3478"\w* dogs \w and|strong="H3478"\w* prowling around \w the|strong="H3605"\w* city.

See what \w they|strong="H3611"\w* spew \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* mouths— sharp words \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* lips: “\w For|strong="H5892"\w* who can hear \w us|strong="H7725"\w*?”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, laugh at \w them|strong="H8085"\w*; \w You|strong="H3588"\w* scoff at \w all|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* nations.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* keep watch \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* strength, \w because|strong="H3605"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* fortress.

\w My|strong="H8104"\w* God of loving devotion \w will|strong="H5797"\w* come \w to|strong="H8104"\w* meet \w me|strong="H8104"\w*; God \w will|strong="H5797"\w* let \w me|strong="H8104"\w* stare \w down|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* foes.

Do \w not|strong="H7200"\w* kill \w them|strong="H7200"\w*, \w or|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w people|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H2617"\w* forget. Scatter \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w by|strong="H7200"\w* \w Your|strong="H7200"\w* power, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w bring|strong="H6923"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* down, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H2617"\w*, \w our|strong="H7200"\w* shield.

\w By|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H7911"\w* sins \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w their|strong="H2026"\w* mouths \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H7911"\w* words \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w their|strong="H2026"\w* lips, \w let|strong="H3381"\w* \w them|strong="H3381"\w* \w be|strong="H5971"\w* trapped \w in|strong="H5971"\w* \w their|strong="H2026"\w* pride, \w in|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H7911"\w* curses \w and|strong="H5971"\w* lies \w they|strong="H5971"\w* utter.

Consume \w them|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H1697"\w* wrath; consume \w them|strong="H1697"\w* till \w they|strong="H6310"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w no|strong="H6310"\w* more, \w so|strong="H1697"\w* \w it|strong="H3920"\w* \w may|strong="H8193"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* known \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* ends \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* earth \w that|strong="H1697"\w* God rules over \w Jacob|strong="H5608"\w*. Selah

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* return \w in|strong="H4910"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* evening, snarling \w like|strong="H2534"\w* dogs \w and|strong="H3045"\w* prowling around \w the|strong="H3588"\w* city.

\w They|strong="H3611"\w* scavenge \w for|strong="H5892"\w* food, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w growl|strong="H1993"\w* if \w they|strong="H3611"\w* \w are|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H7725"\w* satisfied.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* sing \w of|strong="H7646"\w* \w Your|strong="H3808"\w* strength \w and|strong="H7646"\w* proclaim \w Your|strong="H3808"\w* loving devotion \w in|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H3885"\w* morning. \w For|strong="H3808"\w* \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* fortress, \w my|strong="H3808"\w* refuge \w in|strong="H3885"\w* times \w of|strong="H7646"\w* trouble.

\w To|strong="H1961"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* praises, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* fortress, \w my|strong="H1961"\w* God \w of|strong="H3117"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w*.
